title: AudioFields
description: Audio related information for media content items.

meta_start_time_s.description: Start time of media in HH:MM:SS format (relative to the day of broadcast). Applies only to audio radio broadcasts.

meta_duration_s.description: Duration of the radio broadcast in HH:MM:SS format (relative to the start of the broadcast on the given broadcast day).  Applies only to audio radio broadcasts."

record_id_ss.description: Array of record identifiers for radio broadcast segments

record_nb_is.description: Array of record numbers corresponding to radio broadcast segments

nb_record_i.description: Total number of records/segments in the radio broadcast

rreb_plain.description: Audio time stamps of the audio record. Serialized JSON of radio broadcast segments as defined in https://github.com/impresso/impresso-schemas/blob/radio-broadcast-schemas/json/rebuilt/audio_record_contentitem.schema.json.

ub_plain.description: Utterance breaks ends offsets in content item transcript. Serialized array of integers, see 'ub' in https://github.com/impresso/impresso-schemas/blob/radio-broadcast-schemas/json/rebuilt/audio_record_contentitem.schema.json.
